item.title: Docker Tutorial
item.description: Docker Install docker engine and Nvidia-docker on related platforms. Problem of seeing CUDA11 on docker while the host CUDA version in 11. One of the primary functions of nvidia-docker is to inject the all of NVIDIA driver libs from the host into the container so that the container will run properly with GPUs. One of these libraries is libcuda.so. This is one of the reasons you are seeing nvidia-smi report the driver version from your host.
